reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: NGO Interaction Prevention and Protection Program for Victims of Trafficking ? 2012

description.narrative: This project aims at identifying victims of trafficking and domestic violence and people in at-risk situations through two toll-free phone lines in Transnistria and prevention of those antisocial phenomena with the help of the Hotline (HL) and Trust line ( TL) and work with mass media direct emergency assistance for victims and counseling regarding to the risks of trafficking and domestic violence. The project will be implemented in Transnistria region of Moldova. The region includes 5 rayons (Camenca Grigor iopol Rybnitsa Slobodzia and Dubosari) and Tiraspol and Benderi towns.The main reason for launching the project is lack of possibilities and services of local governmental and non-governmental organizations to organize quality legal assistance and protecti on for potential victims of trafficking (VoT) and domestic violence (VoDV) in Transnistria. NGO Interaction through this project will keep the public aware about the situation in trafficking in human beings and domestic violence in Transnistria. The projec t timely ensures a high level of psycho-social and legal assistance for (potential) VoTs and VoDVs. It provides for sharing of best practices gained in the National Referral System (NRS) for (potential) victims implemented in Moldova with the Transnistri a region.The main objective of the project is to develop a firm prevention system and to render access to ?safe migration information? and assistance to a priority group of potential migrants potential victims of trafficking actual victims of trafficking a nd developing access to protection and reintegration services for victims of domestic violence in Transnistria region of Moldova.
